name: PONG! (BrickGames)
description:
LET'S PLAY SOME PONG!! DESCRIPTION:

This simple pong game, was made in just 2 days, and that's it, enjoy.

we know this game is so simple, and it's kind of old, but I really enjoyed making it, and we loved the idea of sharing it with y'all.

I truly encourage you to check out my other games, Crowded Emptiness and Cloud Tycoon.

We would really appreciate any donations, even if it's a small amount, we thank you so much for the support.
